_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The qualities of the unsurpassable seein: Going to see a Realized One or their disciple
Making an end of pain and sadness
The qualities of the unsurpassable heari: Going to hear the teaching of a Realized One or their disciple
The qualities of the unsurpassable acqui: Acquiring faith in a Realized One or their disciple
The qualities of the unsurpassable train: Training in the higher ethics, the higher mind, and the higher wisdom in the teaching and training proclaimed by a Realized One
The qualities of the unsurpassable servi: Serving a Realized One or their disciple
The qualities of the unsurpassable recol: Recollecting a Realized One or their disciple
